item.title: Emscripten with CMake
item.description: TLDR: If you just want a quick solution. Emscripten is a pretty powerful tool for porting C and C++ to JavaScript. It does this through clang which can compile to WebAssembly, Wasm, and it’s own suite of libraries for making things “just work”. It’s fairly straightforward and mostly a drop in replacement for your standard compiler with some exceptions (eg: threads). Dropping it into an existing CMake project, however, isn’t as straightforward.
